pullRequest.title: HIVE-24162: Query based compaction looses bloom filter
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
Keep the orc.bloom.filter during Query based compaction.
Why are the changes needed?
Fix the bug
Does this PR introduce any user-facing change?
No
How was this patch tested?
Test added

nodes.bodyText: Nit: maybe add a param for additional tblproperties instead of a boolean, for easier reading and more flexibility
Just thinking, are there more properties that need to be included in the compacted file, besides orc properties? Maybe not...
